name: Space Miners (Matticus Games)
description:
Space Miners

Space Miners is another projected where I attempted to recreate the classic arcade game Asteroids in 1 hour (Though failed horribly at keeping in that time frame...more like 3 months lol). With my own style of game play choices and art style, this game is sure to remind you of the beloved game and bring you back to the old arcade room. In this project I wanted to become more familiar with using For Loops, working within a 2D space, and my attempt at making a currency and store system. A lot of the  problems I ran into in this game have been solved using a mixture of researching what other people have done and simply figuring out how to solve the problem myself. I am very proud to present you this very small project. Space Miners!

Controls:
  • Forward and Backward movement - W and S
  • Fire Laser - Left Mouse Button
  • Fire Special Weapon - Space Button
  • Use the Mouse the aim the ship
